0: Very good location hotel is very clean and the staff are very helpful and friendly
Loved the kitchenette its conveniently located room is small but nice and the breakfast was great
Great location at a great price will definitely stay here again
Central location near plenty of good restaurants
Great location friendly staff average hotel facilities
The location is incredibly convenient to almost every tourist destination in Manhattan

1: Hotel location is convenient but I saw homeless people gathering nearby the hotel
2: Helpful staff over crowded small rooms located on a nasty grimy street
We were very excited about our stay at Element partly because of the location and partly because a friend of a friend said it was the best hotel they had ever stayed in
Plus although I said it was in a good location near to Time Square the street it is on is a little bit dodgy so would recommend families with young children be accompanied around it
The street where it is located is not that great kinda dirty but safe day and night
This hotel is located in the heart of the garment district which is not ideal for eating or shopping

I like the facilities location I arive at 3 pm from my trip and they give me the room at 7 pm when the check in is supposed to be at 3 I was so tired and then at 8 am they where waking me up at my door to do check out that was not fair I did not like that at all
Rooms could do with an update furniture a little worn but saying that it was functional location was excellent Lifts
I would not recommend taking the transport to the airport arranged by the hotel as it costs more than with the official yellow taxi
It is however a little bit of a walk to any public transportation but that does n’t hurt this hotel at all
